機關資料.機關名稱: 內政部入出國及移民署

已公告資料.採購金額級距: 公告金額以上未達查核金額

1.廠商地址: 104臺北市中山區民權東路2段26號4樓之5
1.廠商地址(英): 4F.-5, No.26, Sec. 2, Minquan E. Rd., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City 104, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
1.是否為中小企業: 否，預估分包予中小企業之金額 0 元

1.品項名稱: 宜蘭人口販運女性(疑似)被害人安置保護服務案

英文公告.機關地址: NO.15 , GUANGJHOU ST., JHONGJHENG DISTRICT , TAIPEI CITY10066 , Taiwan(R.O.C.)
英文公告.標案名稱: Procurement of Service for Female Victims and Suspected Victims of Human Trafficking at Yi-lan Shelter
英文公告.聯絡人: Mr. Chu Yi Yi or Mr. Lin Chi Huang
英文公告.廠商地址: 4F.-5, No.26, Sec. 2, Minquan E. Rd., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City 104, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: A registered and practicing social affairs institute which has the ability to perform a contract; or the main purpose or mission of a juridical association or a legal personality is responsible for social work, public welfare, social policy or social service. Required document or certificate:Ⅰ.Merchandise registration or certificate relevant to procurement subject: vendor registration or certificate of establishment, company registration or business registration documents, certificate of establishment or registration, certificate of factory registration, industry registration certificate, business license for operation, document attesting to the business opening, filing document, or other supporting document confirming the legal registration of establishment issued by the government or an authorized organization. Bidders can also use printed the above document from the government or an authorized organization website (please note that the Unified Business Certificate was abolished on April 12, 2009. Do not submit the Unified Business Certificate as the document proof).Ⅱ.Proof of tax payment: please enclose the most recent term of tax statement; any vendor who has not yet obtained the proof of the tax statement for the most recent term may submit the official letter confirming the business establishment issued by the business tax authorities in charge, and the document attesting to the application for the purchase of Uniform Invoice. Proof of tax payment can be substituted by the most recent term checked receipt indicating no tax in arrears issued by the official. Tax exempt bidders should provide a integrity letter and is exempted from enclosing tax statement.Ⅲ.Proof of bidder’s credit: i.e. a certificate issued no more than six month by bank clearing houses or inquired financial institutes indicating no record of a bounced check within recent three years, financial reports certified by accountants, or proof issued by financial institutes or credit bureaus. A bidder who had any bounced check record but has cleared the payment is still considered to be a qualified bidder. If the authority holds any evidence that indicates a bidder is not welcomed or has bounced check record, the evidence will be considered.Ⅳ.Bidder’s statement of tender.Ⅴ.Ten copies of the application form.Ⅵ.Bidder who is juridical association or legal personality please encloses donation rules or articles of organization.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.1.14機關名稱：內政部入出國及移民署
